channel.title: Bluurr webclient help
channel.description:
I was wondering if someone was willing to make me a webclient from my bluurr client. I wouldn't be asking if I didn't try myself. I followed tutorials, and did everything exactly as the tutorials said but, it still didn't work for me. I kept on getting an error saying that the client could not connect (after it was jarred and put onto my website). If someone could help me that would be awesome.
Here's a link to my client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?4k2dt1w8jwkxq1v]http://www.mediafire.com/?4k2dt1w8jwkxq1v[/url]
Here's a link to my cache: [url=http://www.fileden.com/files/2011/8/16/3183624/cache.zip]http://www.fileden.com/files/2011/8/16/3183624/cache.zip[/url]
Thanks

item.title: Bluurr webclient help
item.dc:creator: @knightlord knightlord
item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

Lol tried tones of times and failed. Kinda why I’m asking for help.

Can someone help me make a webclient? I’m having a lot of trouble with the bluurr webclient.

Read full topic

item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

Yes, I followed the tutorials exactly, but when ever I try to get it working I get the connection error. I’ve done the tutorials a few times with different tutorials too but I always get the same error.

item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

Not really an uploading error, but when it starts up the client and it’s finished downloading the cache I get an error saying that it can’t connect to the server even tho the server is online.
